info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 5:30PM CDT until May 01 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR WESTERN TEXAS...SOUTHEASTERN CIMARRON AND NORTHERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 529 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Griggs, or 16 miles north of Stratford, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Goodwell, Optima, Eva, Griggs, Texhoma and Sturgis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
